result.html: Bhuaigh muid an cluicheWe won the game.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuaiġ muid an cluiċeWe won the game.

result.eng: We played a game of football.
result.html: D'imir muid cluiche peileWe played a game of football.
result.ponchtml: D'imir muid cluiċe peileWe played a game of football.

result.eng: The game stopped in the middle of the play.
result.ga: Stop an cluiche i lár na himeartha
result.orig: Stop an cluiche i lár na himeartha
result.html: Stop an cluiche i lár na himearthaThe game stopped in the middle of the play.
result.ponchtml: Stop an cluiċe i lár na himearṫaThe game stopped in the middle of the play.

result.html: Tá an cluiche thartThe game is over.
result.ponchtml: Tá an cluiċe ṫartThe game is over.

result.ga: Tá muid in ann an cluiche seo a bhuachan
result.orig: Tá muid in ann an cluiche seo a bhuachan
result.html: Tá muid in ann an cluiche seo a bhuachanWe can win this game.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid in ann an cluiċe seo a ḃuaċanWe can win this game.

result.eng: He is also very interested in Gaelic games.
result.ga: Tá suim mhór aige sna cluichí Gaelacha fosta
result.orig: Tá suim mhór aige sna cluichí Gaelacha fosta
result.html: Tá suim mhór aige sna cluichí Gaelacha fostaHe is also very interested in Gaelic games.
result.ponchtml: Tá suim ṁór aige sna cluiċí Gaelaċa fostaHe is also very interested in Gaelic games.

result.eng: He is also very interested in Gaelic games.
result.ga: Tá suim mhór aige sna cluichí Gaelacha leis
result.orig: Tá suim mhór aige sna cluichí Gaelacha leis
result.html: Tá suim mhór aige sna cluichí Gaelacha leisHe is also very interested in Gaelic games.
result.ponchtml: Tá suim ṁór aige sna cluiċí Gaelaċa leisHe is also very interested in Gaelic games.

result.eng: There is a football match between An Spidéal and An Cheathrú Rua on at the park.
result.ga: Tá cluiche peile idir An Spidéal agus An Cheathrú Rua ar siúl ar an bpáirc
result.orig: Tá cluiche peile idir An Spidéal agus An Cheathrú Rua ar siúl ar an bpáirc
result.html: Tá cluiche peile idir An Spidéal agus An Cheathrú Rua ar siúl ar an bpáircThere is a football match between An Spidéal and An Cheathrú Rua on at the park.
result.ponchtml: Tá cluiċe peile idir An Spidéal agus An Ċeaṫrú Rua ar siúl ar an bpáircThere is a football match between An Spidéal and An Cheathrú Rua on at the park.

result.eng: I am leaving to go watch the football match now, bye.
result.ga: Beidh mise ag imeacht le dul ag féachaint ar an gcluiche peile anois slán agaibh
result.orig: Beidh mise ag imeacht le dul ag féachaint ar an gcluiche peile anois slán agaibh
result.html: Beidh mise ag imeacht le dul ag féachaint ar an gcluiche peile anois slán agaibhI am leaving to go watch the football match now, bye.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mise ag imeaċt le dul ag féaċaint ar an gcluiċe peile anois slán agaiḃI am leaving to go watch the football match now, bye.

result.eng: Would you like to go to the match?
result.ga: Ar mhaith leat dul go dtí an cluiche
result.orig: Ar mhaith leat dul go dtí an cluiche
result.html: Ar mhaith leat dul go dtí an cluicheWould you like to go to the match?
result.ponchtml: Ar ṁaiṫ leat dul go dtí an cluiċeWould you like to go to the match?

result.eng: Well, in the summer I go to football matches.
result.ga: Bhuel sa samhradh téim chuig na cluichí peile
result.orig: Bhuel sa samhradh téim chuig na cluichí peile
result.html: Bhuel sa samhradh téim chuig na cluichí peileWell, in the summer I go to football matches.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuel sa saṁraḋ téim ċuig na cluiċí peileWell, in the summer I go to football matches.

result.eng: Do you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.
result.ga: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní bhím Corrchluiche púil sa bpub sin an méid
result.orig: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní bhím Corrchluiche púil sa bpub sin an méid
result.html: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní bhím Corrchluiche púil sa bpub sin an méidDo you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.
result.ponchtml: An mbíonn tú ag imirt snúcair Ní ḃím Corrċluiċe púil sa bpub sin an méidDo you play snooker? No I don't. The odd game of pool in the pub, that's all.

result.html: Cluiche fadálach atá annIt's a tedious game.
result.ponchtml: Cluiċe fadálaċ atá annIt's a tedious game.

result.eng: I enjoy a good game of poker.
result.ga: Bainim an-sásamh as cluiche maith pócair
result.orig: Bainim an-sásamh as cluiche maith pócair
result.html: Bainim an-sásamh as cluiche maith pócairI enjoy a good game of poker.
result.ponchtml: Bainim an-sásaṁ as cluiċe maiṫ pócairI enjoy a good game of poker.
